params.prompt: The video features a girl speaking, sitting upright on a chair with a slight forward lean, her right hand raised, palm facing the camera, face directed toward the camera, a subtle upward curve at the corners of her mouth, bright and focused eyes, and a warm, natural expression. She is wearing a light gray knit cardigan, a dark brown vest underneath, white clothing on the lower body, multi-layered necklaces, rings on her fingers, straight light brown hair flowing over her shoulders, and is positioned in an indoor recording setup. The background includes a wooden door, light-colored curtains, a large green leafy plant on the left, greenery, vases, and warm light lamps on the multi-tiered shelves on the right, a landscape painting with a sunset theme on the wall, creating a cozy and artistic atmosphere with warm yellow lighting combined with natural light.
params.negative_prompt: 色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走
